mapper.select: select a.bug_id,a.version,a.deadline,a.bug_title,b.product_name,c.module_name,d.project_name,e.person_name,f.bugtype_name from bug a join product b on a.product_id = b.product_id join module c on a.module_id = c.module_id join project d on a.project_id = d.project_id join fixup_person e on a.person_id = e.person_id join bugtype f on a.bugtype_id = f.bugtype_id order by a.bug_id desc

select a.bug_content,a.version,a.deadline,a.bug_title,b.product_name,c.module_name,d.project_name,e.person_name,f.bugtype_name from bug a join product b on a.product_id = b.product_id join module c on a.module_id = c.module_id join project d on a.project_id = d.project_id join fixup_person e on a.person_id = e.person_id join bugtype f on a.bugtype_id = f.bugtype_id where a.bug_id=#{bug_id}

select a.bug_id,a.version,a.deadline,a.bug_title,b.product_name,c.module_name,d.project_name,e.person_name,f.bugtype_name from bug a join product b on a.product_id = b.product_id join module c on a.module_id = c.module_id join project d on a.project_id = d.project_id join fixup_person e on a.person_id = e.person_id join bugtype f on a.bugtype_id = f.bugtype_id order by a.bug_id desc limit #{pageBegin},#{pageSize}
